text: Council of National Assemblies of Montenegro () is a non-governmental organization that represents the historical tribes of Montenegro. Representatives include notable intellectuals. The Directoring board president is Nikola Kusovac and Assembly president is Momčilo Vuksanović (as of 2016). The organization issued a declaration against the accession of Montenegro to NATO, signed by 72 representatives of 24 historical tribes, on 21 March 2016. The manifestation was held at the Podgorica cathedral. ==References== ==Sources== * * Category:Ethnic organisations based in Montenegro
title: Vijeće narodnih skupština Crne Gore
